name: Halo Online
notes:
- High settings produce black textures
- Game/Screen freezes sometimes
- Can't get back into server browser sometimes

You must relaunch the game for the latter two issues.

files.archive: N/A:Halo Online archive needed to proceed

content:
files:
- archive: N/A:Halo Online archive needed to proceed
- upgrade: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/287361838767800320/459847345526407178/dist_0.6.0_to_0.6.1_changeset_r2_2.7z
- d9vk8930577d:
    filename: d9vk-master.8930577d229f9b600699f45c6b087ca4af42d613.zip
    url: https://git.froggi.es/joshua/d9vk/-/jobs/452/artifacts/download
game:
  arch: win64
  args: --no-sandbox
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Halo Online/eldorado.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/d9vk/
    file: d9vk8930577d
- move:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/dxvk/d9vk-8930577d/
    src: $CACHE/d9vk/dxvk-release/
- execute:
    command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Halo Online"
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Halo Online
    src: archive
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Halo Online
    src: upgrade
- task:
    app: corefonts vcrun2010 vcrun2012 win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  DXVK_HUD: compiler
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: d9vk-8930577d
